relevant_findings.heent: AT/NC, EOMI, PERRL, anicteric sclera, pink conjunctiva, MMM, good dentition
relevant_findings.neck: nontender supple neck, no LAD, no JVD
relevant_findings.cardiac: RRR, S1/S2, no murmurs, gallops, or rubs
relevant_findings.lung: CTAB, no wheezes, rales, rhonchi, breathing comfortably without use of accessory muscles
relevant_findings.abdomen: nondistended, +BS, nontender in all quadrants, no rebound/guarding, no hepatosplenomegaly
relevant_findings.extremities: no cyanosis, clubbing or edema, moving all 4 extremities with purpose
relevant_findings.skin: warm and well perfused, no excoriations or lesions, no rashes

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Vital signs remained stable during admission.

ultrasound_findings.liver: Hepatic parenchyma within normal limits; smooth contour, no focal mass, no ascites.
ultrasound_findings.bile_ducts: No intrahepatic biliary dilation; CHD measured 5 mm.
ultrasound_findings.gallbladder: Contains multiple stones with wall thickening up to 5 mm, no abnormal luminal distension.
ultrasound_findings.pancreas: Within normal limits, no masses or ductal dilation.
